params.admin: The address to be assigned as the admin of the new token
params.currency: The currency identifier for the new token
params.name: The name for the new token
params.symbol: The symbol for the new token

returns._0: The address of the newly created token contract
The next token ID that will be assigned to a newly created token

createToken(string,string,string,address.notice: Creates a new TIP-20 compliant token

tokenIdCounter().notice: Returns the current token ID counter
